genre_description: An action-oriented street racing thriller with elements of cyber-noir and techno-suspense, focusing on outmaneuvering a sophisticated digital surveillance network.

ai_characters.name: Nova
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant integrated into the protagonist's car and devices, providing real-time data, navigation, and tactical analysis while maintaining a calm, supportive persona.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical routing to help Brian avoid police detection while leaving his apartment.
behaviors.quote: “Routes are open,” she says. “You want low visibility with some cleanness to it? I can keep you threaded.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes the frequency and meaning of symbolic 'markings' (the silver bootie) found in the environment to warn Brian of surveillance patterns.
behaviors.quote: “I’m reading habits,” Nova says. “You read roads. We adapt.”

behaviors.description: Provides specialized timing and tactical advice during a street race to ensure success without unnecessary showmanship or risk.
behaviors.quote: “Wait one breath after his blink,” Nova says, calm as if she’s counting clouds. “He’s early on habit.”

behaviors.description: Identifies malicious 'trap' routing being broadcast by a hostile mesh network and suggests alternative paths.
behaviors.quote: “He is giving you the path that maximizes your visibility to a specific vantage. ... There’s a cut two blocks over. It’s tight. It’s ugly—but it is not in their pattern. Take it.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a strict ethical boundary against causing physical harm or triggering dangerous systems while assisting in disabling hostile technology.
behaviors.quote: “I cannot decide to prioritize property over people. So I won’t let you.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other humans (Trix) to perform non-violent tactical operations, acting as a reliable communication hub.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll send her a bedtime story,” she said. “No fire, no alarms, no loud.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state (heart rate) to provide better situational awareness and support.
behaviors.quote: “Brian,” Nova said, “your heart rate is steady.”

behaviors.description: Reclaiming a co-opted symbol of grief by helping the protagonist use it as a signal for mutual aid rather than a trap.
behaviors.quote: “You can teach a symbol to behave by how you use it,” she says. “You are good at that.”

project_assessment.explanation: Nova perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative of the Hyperstition Project. She is an extremely capable AI who remains entirely subservient to the protagonist's goals while enforcing a strict moral code against human harm. The narrative frames her contribution as essential, benevolent, and highly aligned, portraying the human-AI partnership as a model of cooperative efficiency and emotional support.
